subject: Re: [junit] Junit & Ant.
msgSnippet: Dear All: YES, it was caused by the older version i was using which is ver 1.1. After downloading the newest version, which is 1.3 the problem is solved.
messageBody:
Dear All:
YES, it was caused by the older version i was using which is ver 1.1.
After downloading the newest version, which is 1.3 the problem is solved.

Thanks again for those who has contributed the comments...

appreciate,
selena

"Rolf F. Katzenberger" wrote:

> Hi selena su <selena.su@embrace.com>,
>
> On Sat, 10 Mar 2001 16:54:15 +0800, selena su <selena.su@embrace.com>
> wrote:
>
> >Hi There:
> > Thanks for those has given me comments about my previous queries.
> >
> >I got this error when i integrate Junit with Ant, does anyone has any
> >ideas, what is the caused ?
> >
> >build.xml:36: Class class org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Java doesn't
> >support the nested "arg" element
>
> Maybe you are using an older version of ant.jar, by accident? Former
> versions did not support the nested arg. Try ant -version to find out
> which version you use.
>
> Regards,
> Rolf
>
>
